programmes.show_description: Fantasy sequel with Christopher Lambert. Immortal Connor MacLeod's new-found happiness and settled family life are shattered by the sudden reappearance of his arch-enemy Kane. (1994)
Tense thriller. When a Vietnam veteran returns home from prison to discover that a violent biker gang has been harassing his family, he enlists the help of a drug baron in a quest for revenge. (1986)

British sci-fi adventure. A team of astronomers studying radio signals from outer space discover that their observatory has been transported to a planet in another galaxy. (1967)

A mobster, avenging his brother who was accidentally killed in the ring, stalks an alcoholic ex-boxer. Hulk Hogan guest stars. S4, Ep21

Action adventure with Antonio Banderas. A disgraced Arabic nobleman exiled from his Baghdad home joins forces with Norse warriors to fight shadowy fiends at the end of the first millennium. (1999)

programmes.show_name: Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger
programmes.show_description: Swashbuckling fantasy with Patrick Wayne. Sinbad the Sailor battles evil witches, ghouls and monsters while assisting a crown prince who was turned into a baboon by his wicked stepmother. (1977)
Disaster drama with Charlton Heston. In the aftermath of a catastrophic earthquake in Los Angeles, an architect helping with the rescue effort searches the smouldering ruins for his wife. (1974)
Tense Western drama. A US Marshal is sent to the town of Dogwood Pass to catch a ruthless killer, where a corrupt mayor and an unhinged sheriff stand in the way of justice. (2017)
An unhappily married couple discover love on the ocean when they sail aboard a ship designed for honeymooners. S4, Ep17
Sci-fi thriller with Jason Statham. A crooked prison warden coerces a falsely imprisoned convict into taking part in a high-octane race where convicts battle to the death in customised cars. (2008)
Fantasy thriller with Nicolas Cage. A vengeful father breaks out of Hell to hunt down the leader of a satanic cult who murdered his daughter and plans to sacrifice her child. (2010)
